description: Erik visited his friend in Prague and when I met him, he was on his way back home. He lived on the outskirts and didn't have a long journey ahead of him. He had time for a little interview. In this terrible weather, the boy had nothing better to do. My camera was not a problem and when I told him he could make money, he was genuinely interested. He told me some funny stories, one of them was quite spicy. This wasn't an innocent guy at all. He wanted money but it wasn't easy to negotiate with him. The weather wasn't suitable for an outdoor action so we hid in a flat I had nearby. There the boy got a chance to earn the money I promised him. He never done anything gay so I had to show him the ropes. Erik had a gentle mouth and tight ass, the perfect combination. I left the boy a bit stretched but happy.
title: Czech Hunter 433
